org.flexiblepower.efi.buffer

Class RunningModeBehaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.flexiblepower.efi.buffer.RunningModeBehaviour

  • public class RunningModeBehaviour
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes the behavior of a RunningMode. This class is usually used as the value of a FillLevelFunction, since the behavior may change acoording to the fill level. This class describes the effect on the buffer and the consumed or produced commodities.

    • Method Detail

      • getFillingRate

        public double getFillingRate()
        Gets the effect on the buffer, expressed in the amount of units as specified in the BufferRegistration per second, either positive or negative. For example, if this buffer is a thermal buffer with the unit degrees Celsius (this is specified in the BufferRegistration), and this RunningMode increases the temperature of the buffer with 0.01 degrees Celsius per second, than the value of fillingRate is 0.01.
        Returns:
        The effect on the buffer, expressed in the amount of units as specified in the BufferRegistration

      • getCommodityConsumption

        public CommodityMeasurables getCommodityConsumption()
        Gets the consumption (positive number) or production (negative value) that belongs to this RunningMode.
        Returns:
        The Consumption (positive) or production (negative) of the commodities for this RunningMode

      • getRunningCosts

        public javax.measure.Measurable<javax.measure.quantity.MoneyFlow> getRunningCosts()
        Returns:
        The cost associated with this RunningMode.
